description: This table contains a list of name and address information for various performing sites data has been received from.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: LAB_REFERENCE_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the reference ID of a performing site. The reference ID is the checksum of name, street address, city, state, postal code, phone number, and CLIA number in that order.

columns.name: LAB_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of a performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_DIRECTOR
columns.description: Stores the director of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_STREET
columns.description: Stores the street address of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the state of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAB_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: Stores the postal code of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the phone number of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression.

columns.name: LAB_CLIA_NUM
columns.description: Stores the CLIA number of the performing site associated with either a result component, the narrative, or the impression

columns.name: LAB_OBFUSCATED_ID
columns.description: Stores the Obfuscated ID of a resulting agency. Populated only on the Cosmos Host.
